Trigger.Name: Icelit Dragonsong 氷と光の竜詩
Diamond Frost ダイヤモンドダスト
the House of Light光の津波
龙牙龙爪
Trigger.RegularExpression: ] 1A:1.......:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of (Wyrmfang|Wyrmclaw) from for (?<time>.*?) Seconds

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: 死亡轮回，幕帘行吟光之心雪仇
死亡轮回，罩子翅膀光之心
无敌无尽顿悟，然后换替。
无尽顿悟，昏乱雪仇，大翅膀

Trigger.Name: 天光轮回
Trigger.RegularExpression: Come to me, Hraesvelgr!|聖竜よ、来たれ……！

Trigger.Name: 石化背对
Trigger.RegularExpression: 光によりて、静寂を！|The Light shall usher in peace!

Trigger.Name: 滑冰
Trigger.RegularExpression: Resplendent ice, grant me strength!|氷の輝きを力に……！
